title: Please Help
body:
Hi there! I'm in Bronze V right now and I really want to climb so I'm asking the community for help. Hopefully somebody better than me out there is willing to look at this game and give me an idea of what I need to improve on in order to climb.

Thanks in advance!

replies.body:
I tried watching the whole thing, but the whole "Download server" thing fucked up and it kicked me out.
First off, at the start when both thresh and jinx took 1 tower shot, don't be a bitch you killed them anyway but you could have done so much sooner.

You bought a pink (I believe) and placed it after a failed shaco gank which got you a kill.
Well done, not many people in low elo buy that.
If you support was your duo (Not sure) tell her to get a Relic shield over coin.
You got some nice picks as I could only watch the first 9 mins before it buggered up on me.

But you need to learn to CS a bit better, I know it seems tedious but try going into a custom or bot game. And practice farming.

---

I wasn't able to see much else.
If people are getting angry at you, mute them.
Don't flame others, it doesn't help, yell at the screen don't type it. 

upgrade trinket at lvl 9-10-11 somewhere there just upgrade.

I'm not sure if this will help, but try watching these.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7XPrqvD8Lfo&list=PLyCEt27AsZuvNu0RQiCwgV2j3tR4foqvI

Some guys are in the same position as you, the first guy even made it to Silver on his own.
